resources.string: Artist Partner
Pause/Resume
Hello blank fragment
It will allow timer to keep on running when you switch to another app or switch off the display
Who can use this app?
Can we start a new project without finishing the current one?
How to save time after completing a session?
What will happen to timer if we switch to another app?
What if anyone want to use only timer without using app reference image?
Can it be possible that session will ended automatically when you have switched to another app?
Artists who need to create grids on reference image or track their working hours.
You don’t need to do anything and app will automatically update your Session time;
You can do. App will save all projects separately so you can work on any existing project at any time.
Your timer will pause automatically and resume again when you come back to the app
Yes, you can. Go to the settings and switch on the ‘screen of mode’. Now timer will continue running even when the mobile screen is turned off.
Yes, it’s possible. Sometime android system automatically close the app to optimize the power.
1 - show hide tools
2 - go to home(session will ended here)
3 - use Stop watch manually
4 - go to project overview(session will ended here)
1 - hide/show vertical grids
2 - hide/show timer
3 - grid lines customization (line width, cell size, color)
4 - show/hide diagonal grids
5 - black and white filter
